name: Tesla Breakout Strategy
description: A breakout trading strategy for Tesla stock (TSLA) designed to capture momentum moves.

attributes.entryRules: Buy when TSLA price breaks above 50-day high with high volume.
attributes.exitRules: Sell if price falls 3% below breakout level or RSI crosses above 75.
attributes.riskManagement: Trailing stop loss at 5% below the highest price post-breakout.
attributes.performanceMetrics: Backtested Win Rate: 68%, Average Return per Trade: 12%
